Model

Class Character

  • java.lang.Object
    • Model.Map.MapCell
      • Model.Character
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.datatransfer.Transferable, java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    MapCellMonster

    public class Character
extends MapCell
implements java.io.Serializable
    Character model class. This class contents all the details of character/player. It remains alive as long as the player is on the game.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      Constructor and Description
      Character()
      The constructor initializes all the properties of the character with a value which may be changed later in runtime during the play.

      • getDamageBonus

        public int getDamageBonus()
        This getter method is for part of the damage bonus inflicted on opponent during attack. If using sword you send strength modifier or 0 for a bow. The second part is calculated by controller which is a d10 dice roll. Plus magic influence of items: Long sword and long bow
        Returns:
        _damageBonus returns the damageBonus score of the player (format integer).

      • getHitPoints

        public int getHitPoints()
        Basically it indicates the ability of a player to absorb the hit from a monster. It is in fact the life of a player.
        Returns:
        _attackBonus returns the attackBonus score of the player (format integer).

      • getBackPack

        public java.util.ArrayList<Item> getBackPack()
        It is the backpack of items kept real time in the game.
        Returns:
        It returns the backpack list of items used in the game.

      • createBodyParts

        public void createBodyParts()
        This method creates the body parts of the player. Each body parts can be associated with an Item during the play. Each body part is kept in a particular index in the list.

        head --> 0 upper_body --> 1 left_hand --> 2 right_hand --> 3 finger --> 4 waist --> 5 feet --> 6

      • createInventoryItems

        public void createInventoryItems()
        createInventoryItems() method creates the Item by default at the beginging of the game and keeps those into inventory list. It also initializes the default list model to populate the JList in the view.

      • addBackpackItems

      • calculateArmorClass

        public void calculateArmorClass()
        This is a method that calculate the armor class. It is based on base bonus modifiers of shield and armor and dexterity modifier Influence of magic items: armor, shield, bracer, ring, boots

        public void setMovementLeft(int _movementLeft)

        method to set the level of a player.
        Parameters:
        plevel - is the level of the player. It assumes that level is being incremented by one each time.

      • addLevel

        public void addLevel()
        method to add to the level of a player by 1. It is the level of the player. It assumes that level is being incremented by one each time.

      • minusLevel

        public void minusLevel()
        method to minus to the level of a player by 1. It is the level of the player. It assumes that level is being decremented by one each time.

      • getAttackPerRound

        public int getAttackPerRound()
        getter method for attacks per round available to player
        Returns:
        _attackPerRound is attacks per round.

      • getAttackLeftPerRound

        public int getAttackLeftPerRound()
        getter method to show number of attacks left in that round / turn of a player. max attack per round is level dependant and stored in variable _attackPerRound.
        Returns:
        _attackLeftPerRound number of attacks left in that round / turn of a player.

      • minusAttackPerRound

        public void minusAttackPerRound()
        Method to decrement the attack left per round/ turn of a player.

      • minusMovementLeft

        public void minusMovementLeft()
        Method to decrement the movement left or available to a player by 1 during the players turn / move.

      • endOfTurn

        public void endOfTurn()
        method executed at the end of each players turn that will reset the players values for available movements, base attack bonus and attacks per round in time for his next turn.

      • reduceBaseAttackBonus

        public void reduceBaseAttackBonus()
        Method to recalculate the base attack bonus of a player during his turn. This is required as he can have more than one attack in one turn depending on his level. But his base attack bonus reduces with each consecutive attack.

      • calculateAttackPerRound

        public void calculateAttackPerRound()
        method too calculate the number of attacks per round available to the player. it changes on a per level basis.

      • isIsMelee

        public boolean isIsMelee()
        method to get if melee weapon is worn.
        Returns:
        _isMelee boolean if true means sword is worn ad false means sword is not worn

      • isIsRange

        public boolean isIsRange()
        Method to get if range weapon is worn
        Returns:
        _isRange boolean if true means sword is worn ad false means bow is not worn

      • setIsMelee

        method to set if melee weapon is worn true = long sword worn, false = long sword not worn
        Parameters:

      • wearItem

        public void wearItem(Item pItem)
        Method to wear the item for the player. This sets all flags and sets all magic and normal modifiers to appropriate values and then calls the appropriate functions to recalculate other values as necessary.
        Parameters:
        pItem - the item which want to wear.

      • removeItem

        public void removeItem(Item pItem)
        Method to remove the item from player. This un sets all flags and sets all magic and normal modifiers to zero and then calls the appropriate functions to recalculate values as necessary.
        Parameters:
        pItem - the item which want to remove.

      • getStrengthModifier

        public int getStrengthModifier()
        To get the strength modifier and return a integer value of the strength modifier. This is a public function called get strength modifier. Influence of magic items: belt, ring, bracer
        Returns:
        integer value of strength modifier.

      • getDexterityModifier

        public int getDexterityModifier()
        getter method for dexterity modifier, this calculates total value based on actual ability score + all magic influences if any every time. Influence of magic items: boot.
        Returns:
        integer value of dexterity modifier

      • getWisdomModifier

        public int getWisdomModifier()
        getter method for wisdom modifier, this calculates total value based on actual ability score + all magic influences if any every time. Influence of magic items: ring, helmet.
        Returns:
        integer value of wisdom modifier

      • getCharismaModifier

        public int getCharismaModifier()
        getter method for charisma modifier, this calculates total value based on actual ability score + all magic influences if any every time. Influence of magic items: ring.
        Returns:
        integer value of charisma modifier

      • getIntelligenceModifier

        public int getIntelligenceModifier()
        getter method for intelligence modifier, this calculates total value based on actual ability score + all magic influences if any every time. Influence of magic items: helmet.
        Returns:
        integer value of intelligence modifier

      • getConstitutionModifier

        public int getConstitutionModifier()
        getter method for constitution modifier, this calculates total value based on actual ability score + all magic influences if any every time. Influence of magic items: none.
        Returns:
        integer value of constitution modifier
